post.body: Cumpleanos Feliz.
What's up buddy? Hit me up.
Twitter is definitely it. I just hope the folks that run it can figure out a way to make money so they don't shut it down.
It was pretty nuts. Masks galore. Kind of frightening.
I went and saw them on New Years in DC.
A in C is nothing w/o Layne.
Because it would have been cool to see his career develop. He made awesome music.
Good to follow you. Sorry to hear about the layoffs. Hope you are safe.
I haven't left the office yet!
Oh. My. That is SOME ART. Wow. It looks like something they picked up in a dollar store and slapped on the wall.
Riff away. I ALWAYS look forward to your insights.
I hope it made you happy. Down here in MD it hasn't snowed much, so we're not sick of it yet!
@amarie5304 It better not have been in Baltimore. I will wring her neck if she was here and didn't let me know.
What about Toyota? Saved by Zero?
Cheetoh Moore has a nice ring to it. Ella is hysterical.
Like @djsiry said, the ones focused around promos are often controlled by dealer grps. They respect the brand less, sadly.
I KNOW.
Luck.
I know. Red Star rules. Sooo clean in there.
Yesssssssssssssssss!
Holy crap, man. I can't even make sense of the Gizmodo page now. It's atrocious. Someone vomited info all over the screen.
Both. That's the best part.
Love it. I am craving some NY water right about now. Maybe with a dash of True Lemon.
She has become one of my dearest friends in the world.
That's where the Anna/Garret connection came from! She was awesome to work with.
It'll get better as the day goes on. Promise.
It's cool man. I'm here...
Twitter love
Likes old school Mariah.
Get it now?
Was hilarious in the BSF video. Outtakes especially.
That, too. Haha, it's just THAT time of year.
Oh man, that is HILARIOUS. Those BSF kids are very creative.
I'm addicted to it. Can't do water without it, really.
I've actually done that. With Crystal Light, too. Explosive indeed!
Me too. Argh.
Thanks, that was quick!
@rachelstuart That was AWESOME
You can always bomb late. Just make sure you're following @tweetbomb for instructions!
P.s. Good morning!
Very low key. Too low key. I need to step it up. How was yours?
I had to make that move too. Slightly under duress, but hey.
(way late)
LOL. Let me know what you find out.
Speaking of blowing up, I was mentioned and my inbox is blowing up with new followers!
How much could you earn for Magpie Tweets?
I know that feeling. Ugh. Feel better!
Yeah, @rdeal1 hooked me up. Good to know you!
Hope you had a happy new year, Betsy.
You'll love Twitter. Seriously. Welcome!
That stuff IS addictive. My dad was hooked bigtime on Afrin.
Not really!! Try again.
and I are jammin on IM. Big things.
r/t @BaltimoreMD Baltimore ranked the 10th greenest city in the nation when it comes to sustainability. http://tinyurl.com/6e6gs9
Up and at em.
I wish Layne Staley were still alive.
How you gonna do it by yourself cause I'm not gonna be here to help you.
Finally left work. Probably skipping dinner tonight.
I should get out of the office. Hour drive home still.
Damn you, economy. You cause me nothing but frustration.
Freezing at the dog park
Hey MGHWOM. You drunk yet?
Spinach salad twice today.
I think I am headed to Red Star in Fells.
Loving the digital billboard in Baltimore for 180s - "Lobal warming"
I love True Lemon.
TWEETDUD. Love it.
Just filled my Nalgene with 4 packets of True Lemon. I seriously love it.
R/T @goldenlady New study shows we yawn to cool our brains: http://bit.ly/CDlV ALWAYS WANTED TO KNOW WHY
People that think Casey Anthony isn't responsible for the death of her daughter probably also think OJ was innocent.
Damn, they found little Caylee. I hope whoever did it (come on, we all know it was her mom) goes to jail FOREVER.
Hey, btw, if you are interested in updates about the 2009 Maryland Film Festival...go here to become a fan on FB: http://tinyurl.com/4f22sc
Layla in the office today. Just the two of us. I'll try to get some video with the MiniHD. Mainly for @ahrycyk.
I knew @rdeal1 had something to do with it. That kid is on point.
I just got like 15 new followers tonight. Wonder why so many all of a sudden. Oh, and hi all!
I went to bed at like 12:02
Good morning, 09.
First Tweet of 2009. Nothing important to say...sorry.
